meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>select</kanji> to talk to <kanji>nothing</kanji> but <kanji>sand</kanji> for a really long time, you're <vocabulary>neglecting to contact</vocabulary> anyone else. Your relatives miss you! Stop talking to sand and call them!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
